basics.name: Pieter Herman ✔
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Innovative and proactive Software Engineer and IT Programming Specialist with a passion for learning about new technologies, frameworks and programming languages, and a determination to excel in all tasks. Possesses a never-give-up attitude, successfully working on and solving complex problems with a magical and creative approach to project management; thriving under pressure to deliver the highest quality results. Loves working with dynamic international teams, contributing to and continually learning from senior developers to provide clients with solutions that exceed expectations across functionality, stability and security. Currently seeking a new and exciting opportunity in which to utilise existing communication and negotiation skills to secure new business and gather requirements, collaborating effectively to ensure faults are resolved and projects completed successfully.

work.position: Chief Executive Officer & Full Stack Engineer
work.summary: Co-Founder & Full Stack Developer at Yes by JP. Development and implementation of web applications (React, NextJs) and Android and iOS apps with React Native

Developed, implemented and maintained 3+ web apps and 6+ mobile apps. Designed and implemented in-house NPM modules. Troubleshooted issues affecting production, stage, and development environments as requested. Actively participates and engages the Software Support team in resolving production issues. Integrated app-based solutions with databases, file systems, and cloud-based systems. Presented software design issues, questions, and suggestions for the purpose of arriving at alternative courses of action.

work.position: Technical Support / Quality Engineer Tier 3 Service
work.summary: Provides immediate support to the worldwide sales by offering technical implementation solutions. Setup action plans and develop standards to bring international support to a higher level. Created improvement proposals for software and firmware and aware of the consequences of the suggested changes on the total system. Created technical documentation. Worked with GAMP5 quality standards.

work.position: Support Engineer / Data Administrator /  Operations Support & Pre Production Payment
work.summary:
Carrying out automation of client’s digital order requests, establishing new
projects and maintaining existing processes, including undertaking system
testing to solve local and functional errors, backup and restore.
Collaborated with level 2 personnel in France and Level 1 colleagues
worldwide to create new functionalities and assisted with section work outside
pre-production.
First level support for production in terms of tools & applications.
Analysis and resolution problems occurring in daily production.
Active searching for optimal solutions to fit customer requirements and
capabilities of the processes.
Preparation of production test carried out in accordance with security and
quality processes.
Identifying and solving problems with software used in the data generation
process
Ensure timely and correct completion of tasks for data administration,
implementation of new products as well as change requests
Maintaining close cooperation and good communication with other
departments in order to efficient solve production problems.
Creating and upgrading technical specifications, instructions and procedures
in Dutch and English.
Supported the installation and configuration of Linux OS and generated
reports using Microsoft SQL Server Report Builder.

work.company: GO! Onderwijs van de Vlaamse Gemeenschap
work.summary: Ultimately responsible for managing all aspects of the Primary School De Duizendpoot web development project, including all coding and site design Key Project Achievements. Developing a web site that was modern while maintaining the organisational commitments to maximising equal education opportunities, allowing the school to easily maintain and update it themselves. Incorporating into the design a solid message representing the school as good and creative, resulting in a significant increase in visitor numbers, including parents utilising it to access vital information and news.

work.position: Software Engineer and CEO of the Company
work.summary:
Designing and developing Android mobile applications and a bespoke
content management system, with software development in Java, PHP,
Oracle, SQL Server and other mainstream technologies

Mobile app development in Java.
web development in PHP, Oracle SQL Server.

Provided guidance and advice to customers in Europe regarding technical and
substantive questions relating to hardware and software

Responsible for the development of Mobile Apps for BlackBerry, IOS, Android
platforms with involvement in CMS development
mobile app development in Java, C, C++
web development in PHP, Oracle SQL Server, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML5,
CSS.

Software development in J2EE (Java), Microsoft (.NET), Oracle, SQL Server
and many other mainstream technologies

web development in PHP, Oracle SQL Server, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML5,
CSS.

Played a pivotal role in the management of the complete sales process on a
wide range of projects with the primary focus on recruiting new customers via
outbound calling
-Responsible for the development of relationships with prospective customers
at management level and worked in close conjunction with the Account
Manager

Liaised extensively with both new and existing clients, established their
specific requirements and implemented appropriate project plans accordingly
-Provided a professional first point of contact for clients including advising them
on the progress and achievements of projects
-Identified and maximised opportunities to secure new assignments and
projects with existing clients

Worked in close conjunction with other members of the software development
team on the implementation of a range of high quality, accounting software
products
-Demonstrated an excellent working knowledge of cutting tools, programming
languages, techniques and methodologies.
Software development in C#.NET , MS SQL, SharePoint.

Utilised SharePoint for the purposes of building a website and an Intranet site
with responsibility for ensuring strict adherence to client specifications and
business requirements.
Web development in Sharepoint, ASP.NET, C#.NET

Played a key role on the Sogyo MailClient project with specific responsibility
for Microsoft .NET implementation using C# and Visual Studio.Net
-Coordinated the seamless integration of a component within the application to
enable emails to be received and encoded.
